item.title: Preprocessing
item.description: [Preprocessing]: How to Randomly Sample from a File of Tremendous Size. Dealing with Big Data, I usually face a data file larger than 10GB. Last week, I wanted to sample 100K sentences from the file of 50M-ish sentences. At first, I naively wrote a code to open the file and select samples using indexing samples with numpy.random. Unfortunately, the code was starting to deprive me of my lifetime. I cannot help interrupting the code and searching for the faster method.
